short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to poop your image search!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fun prank to play on your friends and mess them about and its more fun if you don't tell them until after. 

All it does is change images on the page with a picture of rainbow poop, but only works on the search engines.

It will also change the Google logo too.
